meanings.definition: A division or section of a literary work.
meanings.sent1: The book had different fyttes that made it easy to read.
meanings.sent2: I enjoyed the fyttes in the poem because they helped me understand it better.
meanings.sent3: The fyttes in the story were like chapters in a book, each telling a different part of the tale.
meanings.sent4: Her life seemed to be split into fyttes, each representing a different phase.
meanings.sent5: The fyttes in the play were like puzzle pieces, fitting together to reveal the whole picture.

meanings.definition: To divide into sections or parts.
meanings.sent1: She fyttes the cake into equal slices for everyone to enjoy.
meanings.sent2: The teacher fyttes the lesson into smaller topics for better understanding.
meanings.sent3: He fyttes his day into different tasks to manage his time effectively.
meanings.sent4: The artist fyttes the canvas into sections before starting the painting.
meanings.sent5: The chef fyttes the ingredients carefully to create a delicious dish.
